sql.query: SELECT ADJUSTMENT_PERIOD_FLAG, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, CONTEXT, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, END_DATE, ENTERED_PERIOD_NAME, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, PERIOD_NAME, PERIOD_NUM, PERIOD_SET_NAME, PERIOD_TYPE, PERIOD_YEAR, QUARTER_NUM, QUARTER_START_DATE, START_DATE, YEAR_START_DATE FROM GL.GL_PERIODS
sql.queryUpdate: SELECT ADJUSTMENT_PERIOD_FLAG, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, CONTEXT, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, END_DATE, ENTERED_PERIOD_NAME, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, PERIOD_NAME, PERIOD_NUM, PERIOD_SET_NAME, PERIOD_TYPE, PERIOD_YEAR, QUARTER_NUM, QUARTER_START_DATE, START_DATE, YEAR_START_DATE FROM GL.GL_PERIODS where last_udpate_date > ?
